document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 75''' was released in July/August of 1999. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Non-Prophet Organization.Summary: Although this adventure includes a temple and cleric of [[Chauntea]] as a suggestion, it is not specifically set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' setting.

Into the Nest of Vipers.Summary: This is an adventure set in the [[Vast]] in [[1369 DR]], using 2nd edition rules.
